00012 //============================================================================
00013 // Accessors
00014 //   accessors have no parameters and therefore have no normalization 
00015 //   or initial setps
00016 //============================================================================
00017 #define _NoNormalize(_name,_class,_templateparams...)                                                                                                   \
00018         template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>     \
00019         void NormalizeGroup(                                                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00020                 int csource,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    \
00021                 _class<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> *vsrc                                                                                   \
00022         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00023         {}
00024 
00025 
00026 #define _NoInitialSteps(_name,_class,_templateparams...)                                                                                        \
00027         template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>      \
00028         void RegisterInitialSteps(                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00029                 const _class<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> &src,                                                             \
00030                 RegistryOfInitialSteps &regSteps                                                                                                                                                                        \
00031         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00032         {}
00033 
00034 ALL_ACCESSORS_DO(_NoNormalize);
00035 ALL_ACCESSORS_DO(_NoInitialSteps);

00040 //============================================================================
00041 // Rotate
00042 //============================================================================
00043 template <class DATA, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00044 void NormalizeGroup(
00045         int csource, 
00046         SourceTransformRotateOf<DATA,2, PRECISION,SUBSOURCE>* vsrc
00047 ) 
00048 {
00049         Real rTAngle=0;
00050         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00051                 rTAngle += vsrc[n].GetAngle();
00052         }
00053         rTAngle/=csource;
00054 
00055         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00056                 vsrc[n].SetAngle(
00057                         vsrc[n].GetAngle()-rTAngle
00058                 );
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 template<class DATA, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00064 void RegisterInitialSteps(
00065         const SourceTransformRotateOf<DATA,2,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> &src,
00066         RegistryOfInitialSteps &regSteps
00067 )
00068 {
00069         static Real rStepDefault=ConfigValue("congeal.initialsteps.rotate",1.);
00070         regSteps.Register(rStepDefault);
00071 }

00075 template <class DATA, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00076 void NormalizeGroup(
00077         int csource, 
00078         SourceTransformRotateOf<DATA,3, PRECISION,SUBSOURCE>* vsrc
00079 ) 
00080 {
00081         Real rTAngleX=0;
00082         Real rTAngleY=0;
00083         Real rTAngleZ=0;
00084         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00085                 vsrc[n].SetAngle(
00086                         ::Bound(vsrc[n].GetAngleX(),-30.,30.),
00087                         ::Bound(vsrc[n].GetAngleY(),-30.,30.),
00088                         ::Bound(vsrc[n].GetAngleZ(),-30.,30.)
00089                 );
00090         }
00091 
00092         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00093                 rTAngleX += vsrc[n].GetAngleX();
00094                 rTAngleY += vsrc[n].GetAngleY();
00095                 rTAngleZ += vsrc[n].GetAngleZ();
00096         }
00097         rTAngleX/=csource;
00098         rTAngleY/=csource;
00099         rTAngleZ/=csource;
00100 
00101         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00102                 vsrc[n].SetAngle(       
00103                         vsrc[n].GetAngleX()-rTAngleX,
00104                         vsrc[n].GetAngleY()-rTAngleY,
00105                         vsrc[n].GetAngleZ()-rTAngleZ
00106                 );
00107         }
00108 }

00125 //============================================================================
00126 // Scale
00127 //============================================================================
00128 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00129 void NormalizeGroup(
00130         int csource, 
00131         SourceTransformScaleOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION, SUBSOURCE>* vsrc
00132 ) 
00133 {
00134         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,Real> POINT;
00135         POINT ptScale(0.);
00136 
00137         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00138                 vsrc[n].SetScale(vsrc[n].Scale().Bound(POINT(.75),POINT(1.25)));
00139         }
00140 
00141         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00142                 ptScale = ptScale + vsrc[n].Scale();
00143         }
00144         ptScale=ptScale/csource;
00145 
00146         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00147                 vsrc[n].SetScale(
00148                         vsrc[n].Scale() / ptScale
00149                 );
00150         }
00151 }

00155 void RegisterInitialSteps(
00156         const SourceTransformScaleOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> &src,
00157         RegistryOfInitialSteps &regSteps
00158 )
00159 {
00160         static Real rStepDefault=ConfigValue("congeal.initialsteps.scale",.01);
00161         for (int n=0; n<DIMENSIONALITY; n++){
00162                 regSteps.Register(rStepDefault);
00163         }
00164 }

00168 //============================================================================
00169 //============================================================================
00170 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00171 void NormalizeGroup(
00172         int csource, 
00173         SourceTransformTranslateOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE>* vsrc
00174 ) 
00175 {
00176         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, Real> POINT;
00177 
00178         POINT pt=POINT(0.);
00179 
00180         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00181                 vsrc[n].Translate()=vsrc[n].Translate().Bound(POINT(-.1),POINT(+.1));
00182         }
00183 
00184         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00185                 pt = pt + vsrc[n].Translate();
00186         }
00187         pt=pt/csource;
00188 
00189         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00190                 vsrc[n].Translate() -= pt;
00191         }
00192 }
00193

00202         for (int n=0; n<DIMENSIONALITY; n++){
00203                 regSteps.Register(rStepDefault);
00204         }

00255 template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00256 void RegisterInitialSteps(
00257         const SourceTransformWarpOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> &src,
00258         RegistryOfInitialSteps &regSteps
00259 )
00260 {
00261         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, Real> WARPCP;
00262         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, int> POINT;
00263 
00264         static Real rStepDefault=ConfigValue("congeal.initialsteps.warp",.5);
00265 
00266         WARPCP dpt=WARPCP(rStepDefault)/src.PWarpControlPoints()->Size();
00267         forpoint(POINT,pt,0,src.PWarpControlPoints()->Size()){
00268                 regSteps.Register(dpt);
00269         }
00270 }

00273 //============================================================================
00274 //============================================================================
00275 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00276 void NormalizeGroup(
00277         int csource, 
00278         SourceTransformDataScaleOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE>* vsrc
00279 ) 
00280 {
00281         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, Real> POINT;
00282 
00283         POINT pt=POINT(0.);
00284 
00285         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00286                 vsrc[n].SetSlopeIntercept(
00287                         ::Bound(vsrc[n].Slope(),.2,5.),
00288                         ::Bound(vsrc[n].Intercept(),-.5,+.5)
00289                 );
00290         }
00291 
00292         Parameter rSlopeT=0;
00293         Parameter rInterceptT=0;
00294         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00295                 rSlopeT += vsrc[n].Slope();
00296                 rInterceptT += vsrc[n].Intercept();
00297         }
00298         rSlopeT /= csource;
00299         rInterceptT /= csource;
00300 
00301         for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00302                 vsrc[n].SetSlopeIntercept(
00303                         vsrc[n].Slope() / rSlopeT,
00304                         vsrc[n].Intercept() - rInterceptT
00305                 );
00306         }
00307 }

00310 template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00311 void RegisterInitialSteps(
00312         const SourceTransformDataScaleOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> &src,
00313         RegistryOfInitialSteps &regSteps
00314 )
00315 {
00316         static Real rStepDefaultSlope=ConfigValue("congeal.initialsteps.datascale.slope",.01);
00317         static Real rStepDefaultIntercept=ConfigValue("congeal.initialsteps.datascale.intercept",.01);
00318         regSteps.Register(rStepDefaultSlope);
00319         regSteps.Register(rStepDefaultIntercept);
00320 }

00325 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00326 void NormalizeGroup(
00327         int csource, 
00328         SourceTransformSpatialScaleOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE>* vsrc
00329 ) 
00330 {
00331         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, int> POINT;
00332 
00333         POINT pt=POINT(0.);
00334 
00335         forpoint (POINT,pt,0,vsrc[0].GetPCoefficients()->Size()){
00336                 Parameter paramT=0;
00337                 for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00338                         Parameter param;
00339                         SourceMemoryOf<Real,DIMENSIONALITY>* pcoeff =vsrc[n].GetPCoefficients();
00340                         GetPoint(*pcoeff,param,pt);
00341                         param=::Bound(param,-.5,.5);
00342                         SetPoint(*pcoeff,pt,param);
00343 
00344                         paramT+=param;
00345                 }
00346 
00347                 Parameter paramAvg=paramT/=csource;
00348 
00349                 for (int n=0; n<csource; n++){
00350                         Parameter param;
00351                         SourceMemoryOf<Real,DIMENSIONALITY>* pcoeff =vsrc[n].GetPCoefficients();
00352                         GetPoint(*pcoeff,param,pt);
00353                         param-=paramAvg;
00354                         SetPoint(*pcoeff,pt,param);
00355                 }
00356         }
00357 }

00360 template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SUBSOURCE>
00361 void RegisterInitialSteps(
00362         const SourceTransformSpatialScaleOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SUBSOURCE> &src,
00363         RegistryOfInitialSteps &regSteps
00364 )
00365 {
00366         int c=src.GetPCoefficients()->Size().CVolume();
00367         static Parameter paramStepDefault=ConfigValue("congeal.initialsteps.spatialscale",.01);
00368         for (int n=0; n<c; n++){
00369                 regSteps.Register(paramStepDefault);
00370         }
00371 }
